mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worry(worryPostnum, userId, subject, content, views, created, boardLike, replyNum, replyLike) VALUES (#{worryPostnum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{views}, #{created}, #{boardLike}, #{replyNum}, #{replyLike})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM worry w JOIN memberInfo w.userId==m.userId

SELECT worryPostnum, w.userId, nickName, subject, views, DATE_FORMAT(w.created, '%Y-%m-%d') created FROM worry w JOIN memberInfo m ON w.userId==m.userId WHERE worryWhether=1 ORDER BY worryPostnum DESC

SELECT worryPostnum, w.userId, nickName, subject, w.created , view, created FROM worry w JOIN memberInfo m ON w.userId=m.userId
ORDER BY worryPostnum DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{rows}
SELECT worryPostnum, w.userId, nickName, subject, content, w.created, view FROM worry w JOIN memberInfo m ON w.userId=m.userId WHERE worryPostnum=#{worryPostnum}

SELECT worryPostnum, subject FROM worry w JOIN memberInfo m ON w.userId=m.userId
AND (worryNum > #{worryPostnum})
ORDER BY worryPostnum ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT worryPostnum, subject FROM worry w JOIN memberInfo m On w.userId=m.userId
AND (worryPostnum < #{worryPostNum})
ORDER BY worryPostnum DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE worry SET views=views+1 WHERE worryPostnum=#{worryPostnum}
UPDATE worry SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content} WHERE worryPostnum=#{worryPostnum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO worryFile(worryPostnum, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) VALUES (#{worryPostnum}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
